April wars in 2016 are a glorious victory that demonstrates the power of the Azerbaijani people, the Azerbaijani Armed Forces
April fights show that Azerbaijani people and state will never reconcile with occupation and restore their territorial integrity
April wars have created a new situation in the negotiation process on the Armenia-Azerbaijan, Nagorno-Karabakh conflict and in the region as a whole
Status quo in Armenia-Azerbaijan, Nagorno-Karabakh conflict must be changed and occupation of Azerbaijani lands must be abolished
Azerbaijan is not ambitious for the lands of other countries, but will not allow the creation of the second so-called Armenian state on its territory
Nagorno-Karabakh has always been an integral part of Azerbaijan, it is still part of it, it will continue in the future
From now on, the only way for Armenia to live as a country is to put an end to occupying politics and to regulate relations with its neighbors
Since Armenia has occupied Azerbaijani lands, it is dependent on different countries, foreign circles and is not independent
Today, the people of Azerbaijan united around uniform work - strengthening the country, strengthening the national army and restoring its territorial integrity.
The Azerbaijani Army is among the most powerful armies in the world in terms of combat capability, patriotic spirit and logistical support.

@ fhollande "Twelve years ago, there were riots, violence, rage, anger."
@ fhollande "There was a doubt about the possibility of living together"
@ fhollande "Today, you are in front of me with great pride to have been able to transform your city with a school, services"
. @ fhollande "There was here at Les Bosquets a great cultural adventure at the initiative of JR and Ladj Ly"

. @ fhollande "This fresco is important for the collective, you are all in the fresco."
. @ fhollande "This fresco, I saw it at the Palais de Tokyo and it is now exposed here in Montfermeil"

. @ fhollande "Heritage is renewed every generation, every creation adds to heritage, that's what we do together"
. @ fhollande "The most important thing is that artists and visitors will come from all over the world to see the Clichy-Montfermeil fresco"
@ fhollande "Today, there are neighborhoods that are changing, that will bring together great artists and creators from here."
@ fhollande "You are France, be aware of what is happening, hope is rising."
@ fhollande "Thank you for everything you have done for your city, things are changing thanks to you"
